alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 12 at 9:07PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County in southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 907 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1/2 and 3/4 inches of rain have fallen in parts of the advisory area. - Some locations that could experience minor flooding include... Islip, Brentwood, Medford, Ronkonkoma, Babylon, Patchogue, Holbrook, Bay Shore, Sayville, Captree State Park, Gilgo State Park, Central Islip, West Islip, Holtsville, North Bay Shore, East Islip, Bohemia, Bayport, Oakdale and North Patchogue. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
